text: Devetero vrela (English Nine Sources) is short right tributary of Ilomska river, below Petrovo Polje.Vojnogeografski institut, Ed. (1962): Šiprage (List karte 1:25.000, Izohipse na 20 m). Vojnogeografski institut, Beograd / Military Geographical Institute, Ed. (1962): Šiprage (map sheet 1: 25.000, Contour lines at 20 m). Military Geographical Institute, Belgrade. Although long only a few hundred meters, can be very rich in watercourses, especially in springs. This waterflow is named after nine sources at the same place, although it is difficult to confirm visually. ==Related pages== *Ilomska ==References== Category:Rivers of Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: Devetero vrela
